mapper.sql: QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ID, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME_EN, PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA,QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA_EN, ADMINS, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, LAST_OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME,CREATOR_ID
mapper.select:
select count(*) from TOM_QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION where PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{parentClassificationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and INSTR(QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME,#{questionClassificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0
mapper.insert: insert into TOM_QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION ( QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME_EN, PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA,QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA_EN, ADMINS, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, LAST_OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME) values ( #{questionClassificationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionClassificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionClassificationNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentClassificationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{questionClassificationAbstra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionClassificationAbstraEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into TOM_QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER,
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME,
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME_EN,

QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA,
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA_EN,
ADMINS,
ADMIN_NAMES,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATOR,
LAST_OPERATOR,

LAST_OPERATOR_ID,
UPDATE_TIME,

#{questionClassificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{questionClassificationNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update TOM_QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER = #{questionClassificationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME = #{questionClassificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME_EN = #{questionClassificationNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{parentClassificationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA = #{questionClassificationAbstra,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA_EN = #{questionClassificationAbstraEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMINS = #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMIN_NAMES=#{adminNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_OPERATOR = #{lastOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_OPERATOR_ID = #{lastOperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{questionClassificationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TOM_QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION set QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER = #{questionClassificationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME = #{questionClassificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME_EN = #{questionClassificationNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{parentClassificationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA = #{questionClassificationAbstra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ABSTRA_EN = #{questionClassificationAbstraEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMINS = #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_OPERATOR = #{lastOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{questionClassificationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from TOM_QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION where QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_ID in (${ids})
and INSTR(QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION_NAME,#{example.questionClassificationName,jdbcType=DECIMAL})>0
